Those who are greedy and desirous give rise to discrimination. If there is no discrimination, attachment is severed. If attachment is severed, there is no reality. Because there is no reality, there is nothing to be greedy about in the middle. Because there is no greed, that is the truth.

Thus, when seeking in this way, one does not attain solidity. If there is no solidity, then it is empty. If it is empty, then it is quiescent. If it is quiescent, then it is empty.

Taking this to be self, this is what belongs to self. Because of the inverted conception of self, one grasps what belongs to self. Because of grasping what belongs to self, one then engages in action. Within the realm of action, one gives rise to four kinds of activities.
